Gap Description: No detailed documentation on integrating zipBoard with CI/CD pipelines such as GitHub Actions or GitLab CI for automated feedback capture.
Suggested Title: CI/CD Integration Guide for Automated Review Workflows

Gap Description: Missing guidance on WCAG compliance and accessibility testing within zipBoard, including how to audit and remediate inaccessible annotations.
Suggested Title: Accessibility (WCAG) Compliance Guide for zipBoard Users

Gap Description: Insufficient troubleshooting steps for ad‑blocker or browser extension issues that prevent annotation capture, including whitelist instructions.
Limited documentation on SSO (SAML/OIDC) configuration, MFA enforcement, and IP whitelisting for enterprise security posture.
Suggested Title: Enterprise Security Setup: SSO, MFA, and Whitelisting

Gap Description: Absence of comprehensive examples showing how to use webhooks and the zipBoard API for custom automation, including rate‑limit handling and error recovery.
Suggested Title: Webhooks & API Automation Guide with Real‑World Examples
